# EmoDi is Emoji Parser in Text 
```
hzkl@pc:~/Documents/project1$ ./app

Enter Text:
Hello My Name is Emodi <like><heart>

------------------------------------

Parsed Text:
Hello My Name is Emodi üëç‚ù§Ô∏è

hzkl@pc:~/Documents/project1$
```
